about_the_game:
Snackdown is a fun and straightforward collectible card game featuring over 60 unique and charming food-themed cards. From olives to sushi, each card brings its own flair to the table. Build your collection, explore different combinations, and enjoy the simplicity of trading and collecting in a casual and relaxed environment.

Features:

  • Collect: Over 60 food-themed cards with distinct rarities and personalities.

  • Trade: All cards are Steam Inventory items, meaning you can trade them directly with friends or other players.

  • Discover: Open booster packs to see what surprises await you.

Snackdown is perfect for players who love the joy of collecting without unnecessary complexity. Whether you're a casual gamer or a dedicated collector, this game offers a lighthearted experience with a culinary twist.

name: Snackdown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Collect, trade, and explore a world of food-themed fun! "Snackdown" is a lighthearted collectible card game featuring over 60 unique cards, ready for trading and showcasing. Perfect for casual players and collectors alike!
